title: Inside Leigh-Anne Pinnock's 28th birthday bash
text:
The girls of Little Mix pocketed a staggering £9million last year.

However, Leigh-Anne Pinnock's band mates where nowhere to be seen as she rang in her 28th birthday with a fun-filled birthday bash.

Keeping things low-key and chill, the songstress, 28, proved to be having the time of her life as she enjoyed a cosy sleepover with her nearest and dearest in a neon pink den.

Birthday girl: Leigh-Anne Pinnock's Little Mix band mates where nowhere to be seen as she rang in her 28th birthday with a fun-filled birthday bash

Leigh-Anne looked like she was having the time of her life as she flashed peace signs while sitting on a floor full of comfortable rugs and pillows.

The party atmosphere was in full effect thanks to dimmed, pink lighting, complete with fairy lights.

A clip of the room also showed the beauty's loving shrine dedicated to her beau Andre Gray, in which his footballing memorabilia was framed and hung on the wall.

Despite her Little Mix bandmates not being there, Leigh-Anne proved to be in good company as she shared group snaps with her squad.

Sleepover: Keeping things low-key and chill, the songstress proved to be having the time of her life as she enjoyed a cosy sleepover with her nearest and dearest in a neon pink den

'All ready to go!' The party atmosphere was in full effect thanks to dimmed, pink lighting, complete with fairy lights

Fun times: Despite her Little Mix bandmates not being there, Leigh-Anne proved to be in good company as she shared group snaps with her squad

The hitmaker added the gushing caption: '28 going on 18! Thank you to everyone who made me feel special and loved on my Bday!

'Some of you guys had me in tears with the beautiful videos you made ❤️ to my girlies from day 1 (with a couple missing) we’ll be having our sleepovers until we old and grey, thank you for the best night! I love you all millions!! ❤️.'

Despite not being there, Leigh-Anne bandmate Jade Thirlwall was sure to share a number of snaps on her Stories to wish her a fantastic birthday.

Leigh-Anne shared the pictures to her own Instagram, which saw a lovely message from Jade which read:

'It's one of my favourite human's birthday today. We've shared so many amazing memories together. Had a lorra laughs, wrote a lorra tunes together, stood together over the years. You've been my sanity in this world of madness. I love you so much my sister, and I'm always so proud of you!'

'You've been my sanity': Despite not being there, Leigh-Anne bandmate Jade Thirlwall was sure to share a number of snaps on her Stories to wish her a fantastic birthday

Meanwhile, Little Mix have been crowned X Factor's richest winners, as each member of the quartet are said to have earned £1.6 million each

The Sun reports accounts made available on Companies House on Tuesday, show Little Mix double their earnings last year from 1.74 million in 2017 to £3.93 million.

Their tour company is said to have profits of £5million, bringing their total earnings to £8.93 million in 2018.

They are said to have a healthy £10million sitting in bank and paid themselves £1.6million each in dividends.
description: Leigh-Anne Pinnock's Little Mix band mates where nowhere to be seen as she rang in her 28th birthday with a fun-filled birthday bash.
